00038 #ifdef ORO_PRAGMA_INTERFACE
00039 #pragma implementation
00040 #endif
00041 #include "parse_exception.hpp"
00042 
00043 #include <sstream>
00044 
00045 namespace RTT
00046 {
00047     using namespace detail;
00048   // implemented here to avoid having to include sstream in the header
00049   const std::string parse_exception_wrong_number_of_arguments::what() const
00050   {
00051     std::ostringstream stream;
00052     stream << "Wrong number of arguments in call of function \""
00053            << mcomponentname << "." << mmethodname
00054            << "\": expected " << mexpectednumber
00055            << ", received " << mreceivednumber << ".";
00056     return stream.str();
00057   }
00058 
00059   // implemented here to avoid having to include sstream in the header
00060   const std::string parse_exception_wrong_type_of_argument::what() const
00061   {
00062     std::ostringstream stream;
00063     stream << "Wrong type of argument provided for argument number "
00064            << margnumber << " in call of function \""
00065            << mcomponentname << "." << mmethodname
00066            << "\". Expected type "<<mexpected<<", got type "<< mreceived <<".";
00067     return stream.str();
00068   }
00069 
00070   file_parse_exception::~file_parse_exception()
00071   {
00072     delete mpe;
00073   }
00074 
00075   file_parse_exception::file_parse_exception( const file_parse_exception& rhs )
00076     : mpe( rhs.mpe->copy() ), mfile( rhs.mfile ), mline( rhs.mline ),
00077       mcolumn( rhs.mcolumn )
00078   {
00079   }
00080 
00081   const std::string file_parse_exception::what() const
00082   {
00083     std::ostringstream stream;
00084     stream << "Parse error at line "
00085            << mline << ": " << mpe->what();
00086     return stream.str();
00087   }
00088 
00089     parse_exception_no_such_constructor::parse_exception_no_such_constructor(const std::string& tname,
00090                                                                              std::vector<DataSourceBase::shared_ptr> args)
00091         : margsig( "No such constructor found: " + tname + "(")
00092     {
00093 
00094         for(std::vector<DataSourceBase::shared_ptr>::iterator it = args.begin();
00095             it != args.end();
00096             ) {
00097             margsig += (*it)->getType();
00098             if ( ++it != args.end() )
00099                 margsig += ", ";
00100         }
00101         margsig += ")";
00102     }
00103 }
